doc:
Philip Glenister https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philip_Glenister 0 Philip Haywood Glenister (born 10 February 1963) is an English actor, best known for his role as DCI Gene Hunt on the BBC series Life on Mars and its sequel Ashes to Ashes, Reverend Anderson in Outcast, and Mal Pemberton in Living the Dream. Philip_Haywood_Glenister ( born 10_February_1963 ) is an_English_actor , best_known for his_role as DCI_Gene_Hunt on the_BBC_series_Life on Mars and its_sequel_Ashes to Ashes , Reverend_Anderson in Outcast , and Mal_Pemberton in Living the_Dream .
